Uses of Interface
net.openhft.lang.collection.DirectBitSet

  • Packages that use DirectBitSet 
    Package Description
    net.openhft.lang.collection  

    • Uses of DirectBitSet in net.openhft.lang.collection

      Classes in net.openhft.lang.collection that implement DirectBitSet 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ATSDirectBitSet
      DirectBitSet with input validations and ThreadSafe memory access.
      class  SingleThreadedDirectBitSet
      DirectBitSet with input validations, This class is not thread safe
      Methods in net.openhft.lang.collection that return DirectBitSet 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.and(long longIndex, long value) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.and(long longIndex, long value)
      Performs a logical AND of the long at the specified index in this bit set with the argument long value.
      DirectBitSet SingleThreadedDirectBitSet.and(long longIndex, long value) 
      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.andNot(long longIndex, long value) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.andNot(long longIndex, long value)
      Clears all of the bits in the long at the specified index in this DirectBitSet whose corresponding bit is set in the specified long value.
      DirectBitSet SingleThreadedDirectBitSet.andNot(long longIndex, long value) 
      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.clear() 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.clear()
      Sets all of the bits in this BitSet to false.
      DirectBitSet SingleThreadedDirectBitSet.clear() 
      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.clear(long bitIndex) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.clear(long bitIndex)

      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.clear(long fromIndex, long exclusiveToIndex) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.clear(long fromIndex, long toIndex)
      Sets the bits from the specified fromIndex (inclusive) to the specified toIndex (exclusive) to false.
      DirectBitSet SingleThreadedDirectBitSet.clear(long fromIndex, long exclusiveToIndex) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSetBuilder.create(long size) 
      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.flip(long bitIndex) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.flip(long bitIndex)
      Sets the bit at the specified index to the complement of its current value.
      DirectBitSet SingleThreadedDirectBitSet.flip(long bitIndex) 
      DirectBitSet ATSDirectBitSet.flip(long fromIndex, long exclusiveToIndex) 
      DirectBitSet DirectBitSet.flip(long fromIndex, long toIndex)
      Sets each bit from the specified fromIndex (inclusive) to the specified toIndex (exclusive) to the complement of its current value.
      DirectBitSet SingleThreadedDirectBitSet.flip(long fromIndex, long exclusiveToIndex)
